item.title: Service principal required for Microsoft Entra ID
item.description: Starting March 31, 2026, Microsoft Entra ID will no longer support service principal-less authentication behavior. This change aims to strengthen security in Microsoft Entra ID by ensuring that all applications active in a tenant have an associated service principal. All applications making service principal-less authentication requests in a tenant will be impacted unless action is taken by March 31, 2026.
